original_text:
You provide a broad path for my feet,
    so that my ankles do not give way.
korean_text: 내 걸음을 넓게 하셨고 나를 실족하지 않게 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: You provide a broad path for my feet
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내 발을 위해 넓은 길을 제공하시고

sentences.original_text: so that my ankles do not give way
